transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hello?
Executive: Ji? 
Customer: Se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Aap?
Customer: Hello, voice aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan aa rahi hai, boliye.
Customer: Se baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan boliye. Se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir, wo aapne complaint kiya tha na ki aapke PNS pe matlab jab bhi koi buyer call karta hai to connect nahi hota hai, IndiaMART pe direct aata hai, right?
Customer: Ek minute mam, ek minute.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji mam, hamara jo PNS hai na, agar meri party hame call kar rahi hai na, to IndiaMART wale phone uthate hai.
Customer: Ji, wahi jo issue aapko ho raha tha, isliye call kiya, bataiye.
Customer: Haan wahi mam, agar aisa hota hai mam to phir kaise hoga? Hamara buyer humko contact kare, IndiaMART wale phone utha ke usko dusri company ka number de rahe hai.
Executive: Haan ji, uska issue mai bata deti hu, isliye maine call kiya hai. Abhi aap login hai apne company pe?
Customer: Profile pe login hai aap apni?
Customer: Matlab laptop pe login kar du?
Executive: Haan ji, login kar lijiye, uska issue mai resolve kara deti hu, isliye call kiya, aap kar lijiye.
Customer: Haan ji, aaram se kariye.
Customer: Haan login kar liya.
Executive: Login kar liya? Abhi aap waha pe profile dikh raha hai, jaise left me dikhe dashboard, profile, lead manager ye option show kar rahe hai aapko?
Executive: Sabse last me setting ka option aa raha hai login karne ke baad? Aapne phone me kiya ya laptop me?
Customer: Waha PC me hi kiya hai. Profile me jana hai na mujhe?
Executive: Nahi nahi, sabse niche setting ka option dikh raha hoga waha pe aapko, usme jaiye.
Customer: Setting.
Executive: PNS setting. PNS call setting me jaiye.
Executive: Waha pe setting dikh raha hoga, your PNS number dekh lijiye. Uske baad setting.
Customer: PNS call setting hai mam waha par, waha par number apna dono dala hua hai maine.
Executive: Ji ji, waha pe likha hai na, would you like to receive calls only from foreign countries, second line me?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Wo dikh raha hai aapko option?
Executive: Second option dikh raha hai aapko, would you like to receive calls only from foreign countries?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan matlab notification setting hai, account setting hai aur PNS call setting hai.
Executive: Haan ji, mai bata rahi hu, jaise setting wale option pe gaye. Uske baad pehle notification setting hai, phir account setting, uske baad PNS call setting likha hai na, teesra option?
Customer: Haan PNS call setting.
Executive: PNS wale pe jaiye.
Executive: Uspe click kiya, sabse pehli line me aapka number aa raha hoga, your PNS number.
Customer: Aa raha hai.
Executive: Uske baad dusra aa raha hoga, would you like to receive calls only from foreign countries?
Customer: Dusri line dikh rahi hai aapko, second line?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uske samne na yes hoke green me aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ye aa raha hai.
Executive: Usko off kar dijiye.
Customer: Off kar diya.
Executive: Kar diya waha se?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second mai check kar leti hu, line pe rahiye.
Executive: Haan ji, abhi off ho gaya hai. Sir, ye jo aapne foreign countries wala on kiya hua tha na, isi reason ki wajah se na jo aapko buyer call connect kar rahe the, to wo direct IndiaMART wale utha rahe the. Yahi to issue aa raha tha aapko?
Customer: Okay, barabar hai.
Executive: To isi wajah se wo us pe call aa raha tha, abhi jaise off ho gaya hai. To jo bhi buyer aapko call karenge, to wo aapko hi connect hoga. Abhi off show kar raha hai, ek baar refresh karke dekhiye, meri side pe to kar raha hai. Aap ek baar refresh karke dekhiye, wo green se grey ho gaya hoga, yani off ho gaya hoga.
Customer: Ho gaya aur mam dusra dusra setting karne ka hai apne ko. Dekho food industry dikhta ho na.
Executive: Aa samajh nahi rahi, kya baat kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan meri jo company ka naam hai na, Krushi Food Industries.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Wo mai likhta hu mam, to kuch alag hi number aa raha hai dusra.
Executive: Number ya name?
Customer: Name ya number dono bhi aap bolo na. To Krushi Food Industries jo hamara contact hai wo nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Aapka nahi aa raha hai? Dekhiye PNS call setting me ye jo pehla number likha hai, wo to. Nahi nahi, abhi mai mam, nahi nahi, as a customer mai gaya hu.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Kharid karna hai, maine mera logout kar diya hai. Abhi mai Krushi Food Industries se desktop pe ja raha hu. To Krushi Food Industries dekhta hu na, ji bol raha ki dusri company aa rahi hai, matlab hamara kyu nahi aa raha hai mam? Krushi Food Industries dusra hai hi nahi koi brand.
Executive: Nahi, aisa to nahi hoga, aap usme spelling mistake to nahi kar rahe hai? Aap kaha pe search kar rahe hai, us pe, apne profile pe?
Customer: Nahi nahi, aise Google me search kar raha hu mai, Krushi Food Industries.
Executive: Google pe search kar rahe ho? To agar Krushi Food. Google pe mai. Google pe maine search kiya Krushi Food Industries.
Executive: To boliye.
Customer: Aur IndiaMART ke page pe gaya Krushi Food Industries me.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: To mam dusra hi sab kuch aa raha hai. Aap ek baar search karo na.
Executive: Mai check kar leti hu, line pe rahiye ga. Abhi ye jo, pehle mai wo bata deti hu aapko, jo ye aapko buyer ki call abhi aapke number pe hi aayegi, ye off ho gaya hai, to isme to koi issue nahi hai aur abhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi mam, abhi ho gaya to koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: To abhi mai check kar leti hu, line pe rahiye ga.

Executive: Line pe rahiye ga, mai check kar rahi hu.

Executive: Sir, aapko jaise aap company, aap keh rahe hai na Google search karte hai IndiaMART pe, jo bhi karte ho, to koi aur company aa rahi hai aapke name se, balki usme branch bhi nahi hai dusri, right?
Customer: Nahi nahi, isme branch bhi likha hua hai, hamara hi address hai, sab kuch hamara hi hai. Product bhi dusra hai. Sab kuch dusra hai, matlab product apna hi hai to phir aisa kyu ho raha hai?
Executive: Company aa raha hai kaise? Matlab product aapka hi hai, company ka name address sab aapka hi hai, lekin company ka name different aa raha hai, address wagera sab same hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi, company ka name wahi hai, Krushi Food Industries.
Executive: Thik hai. Address bhi wahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: To aa raha hai, Krushi Food Industries ek hamara aa raha hai, ek dusra aa raha hai, address sab same hi hai, matlab dusra to mam kyu aa raha hai, mai wahi bol raha hu. Ye keh rahe ho.
Customer: Dekh lijiye, call number bhi dusra hi hai.
Executive: Mai dekh leti hu.
Customer: To usko remove karna padega na mam?
Executive: Sir, iske regarding mai apne senior se baat kara rahi hu, thik hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second line pe rahiye ga.

Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji, good morning sir, Aditya baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji, sir hamare baat ho raha tha kya? 
Executive: Ji, ji sir, ye aapka number ka to karwa diya hai, calling to chalu ho jayegi ab.
Customer: Ji ji, barabar hai aur hamara jo last week bhi baat hua tha na hamara?
Executive: Haan, last week bhi hua tha.
Customer: Haan wo mai bahar tha isliye koi baat nahi.
Customer: Namaste sir, abhi bhi kya bol raha hu. Ji. Sir setting me Krushi Food Industries search kar raha hu na Google pe. Haan. To dusri company dusre hi sab contact detail aa raha hai. 14 saal purani company hai Krushi Food Industries. Jiska koi registration bhi nahi hai. Aur hamara address hai aur hamara hi company ka address contact number dusra hai. Jaise aapne Google pe search kiya Krushi Food Industries, thik hai? Haan, haan. Phir uske baad aapka aata hai. IndiaMART pe gaye hum. Pehla hi aa raha hai Krushi Food Industries.co.in, phir aa raha hai IndiaMART karke. Ji sir. Manufacturer from Bhavnagar, 14 saal purani company. Haan wahi wahi link me gaye. Haan ye ek Mahua ki koi company hai. Nahi sir, Mahua ki nahi hai sir, ye hamari company hai. Ek second rukiye sir, mai aapko bata deta hu. Ye aap hi ke in se lagta hai create hua hai, kisi other number se free account bana hua hai sir. Haan, free account bana hua hai sir, jo remove karne ka hai abhi. Nahi to isko mai bata de raha hu kaise band hoga. Aap ise close kar dijiyega. Haan, nahi sir, wo number hi nahi hai mere paas. Kis number se kiya abhi kya pata? Number mai aapko bata deta hu na, ek apne aakhri me. Haan? Last me 153 hai sir. 153. Jo Mahua wali company hai na, usme. Mai wahi bata raha hu sir. Abhi dusra koi hoga, abhi 153 me kaun register aaya hoga 14 saal pehle wo kisi ko pata nahi hoga na sir. Abhi ye aapki nahi hai na? Haan sir ji, kyuki Krushi Food Industries maine jo aapka package liya hua hai, lekin chala koi aur raha hai abhi to aisa lag raha hai. Account use bhi nahi hota lagta hai, kisi ne free wala banwaya tha. Haan, abhi call karenge to call to jayega hi sir. Aur meri Krushi Food Industries dikhega to IndiaMART pe yahi show ho raha hai. Matlab mera aa hi nahi raha hai wo par page. Ek baar nikal gaya phir phir koi likhega to mera aayega na page? Nahi, isko dekhiye, iska agar mai aapko ek baat batau na, is pe kisi ke koi call bhi nahi hai, kuch bhi nahi hai, sab zero hai. Nahi lekin sir ji aa raha hai na wo, abhi Krushi Food Industries Google pe aap likhoge to kaun sa page aa raha hai wo mujhe bataiye. Mera nahi aa raha hai na? Problem wo hai. Nahi nahi, iska mai ek baar close karne ka dekh le raha hu. Ki close kaise hoga. Aur aap mujhe dopahar tak ka time de dijiye iske liye. Mai isko close karne ka. Wo sab karne ka hai sir ji. Wo inquiry nahi aa raha hai, wo sab hamara baat hua tha na ek baar. Nahi nahi, wo hamara proper regular hai, usme koi problem nahi hai. Kyuki in pe nahi ja raha hai. Is Bhavnagar wale Krushi Food pe koi inquiry nahi ja rahi hai hamari. Nahi nahi wo nahi. Mera inquiry bada nahi aa raha hai. Haan wahi wahi ek meeting karwao sir aur kuch dekhte hai aise kuch order nahi mila hai ha abhi tak. Aap abhi system pe office me hai? Haan system pe hi baithe hai. Thik hai, rukiye mai aapka do minute dijiye, do minute me mai schedule kar raha hu. Aur ye concern close. 
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye jo complaint open tha na, call wala, sahi ho gaya, mai complaint abhi close kar de raha hu aur phir aapko do minute me call back karwa raha hu. Haan aur ye 14 saal purani jo company hai na wo bhi nikalwani hai sir. Wo nikalwa wo uski jimmedari aap mere upar rehne dijiye sir. Wo mai kara dunga. Ji thik hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyer calls are going to IndiaMART directly.

- Another company showing up with similar name.

- Inquiries not being received.



Resolution:

- Turned off foreign country call setting.

- Assured the customer that the issue is resolved.

- Executive will schedule a meeting.

- Executive will close the complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 2 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, pns settings, google search
